channel.title: R on Shamil Khedgikar
channel.description: Recent content in R on Shamil Khedgikar

item.title: India Pulse
item.description: India Pulse is an Aadhaar pulse is an ongoing project between the Indian School of Business and the Office of the Divisional Commissioner of Maharashtra, that aims to leverage the Indian digital identity Aadhaar to accomplish objectives of effective last-mile delivery of welfare schemes and proactive, data-driven decision making.

item.title: Clarence Stein Institute Interactive Database Viewer
item.description: This interactive database viewer was built as part of a year long project of revamping the Clarence Stein Institute of Urban and Landscape Studies at the Department of City and Regional Planning, Cornell University. This product was one of the deliverable in my year long appointment at the Institute from August 2017 to August 2018. The interactive database documents the projects funded by the Institute from its establishment in 1992 to 2015.
